type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeLibrarySpec
type.description: Definition of a native library component that is to be built by Gradle.

method.name: getApi
method.description: Converts this library to a native library requirement that uses the api library linkage.

method.name: getShared
method.description: Converts this library to a native library requirement that uses the shared library variant. This is the default.

method.name: getStatic
method.description: Converts this library to a native library requirement that uses the static library variant.

property.name: api
property.description: Converts this library to a native library requirement that uses the api library linkage.

property.name: shared
property.description: Converts this library to a native library requirement that uses the shared library variant. This is the default.

property.name: static
property.description: Converts this library to a native library requirement that uses the static library variant.
